remarks: Inverse of an infinite group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tsmsinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
tsmsinv.p $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
tsmsinv.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
tsmsinv.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. TopGrp ) $.
tsmsinv.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
tsmsinv.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
tsmsinv.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( G tsums F ) ) $.
tsmsinv $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) e. ( G tsums ( I o. F ) ) ) $.
